name: 居家串门 Corona Time
description:
PREMISE

I miss my friends terribly during the quarantine and want to visit them. So I made this game to roam around in.

HOW TO PLAY

Move: W A S D
Switch views / Precise movements: Right Click
Drink: Left Click the Corona beer

Change Display Quality: number keys

简介

在洛杉矶的居家隔离期间，我非常想念我的朋友们。于是我只得漫步在这款游戏之中。

操作指南

移动：W A S D

转换视角 / 查看详情：鼠标右键

喝酒：对准科罗娜点击鼠标左键

更改显示质量：数字键

Minimum Requirements

Operating system: Windows® 7 / Windows® 8 / Windows® 10 64-bit system

Processor: Intel® Core™ I5 / AMD Phenom™ II X3

Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 660 / AMD Radeon™ HD 7950

Memory: 6 GB RAM
